website_summaries.verdict: Convenient and practical with the added safety and comfort of a sensor light around the edges.
pros: We are impressed with how quickly this dual outlet pairs with Alexa and Smart Life
Expands one outlet to two instantly, with full features via smartphone app
The dusk-to-dawn sensor light makes for a stylish nightlight
cons: Connects only through 2.4 GHz band on home WiFi router, not 5 GHz

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smart plug in the house and I am so thrilled! The price for 4 outlets is unbeatable!! I am so impressed with how easy it was to set up. The app smart life connects with other types of smart plugs too so that will make it easy to add more and control with my Alexa! I have it set up with our Christmas tree and it’s even on a schedule so it comes on in the evening and turns off when I go to bed! Or I can just say “Alexa, turn off the Christmas Tree and within one second she does it!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should, night light is annoying.
customer_reviews.text: These plugs work pretty well. The set up was very easy through the Smart Life app. Although i had to first turn off "smart connect" setting of my router so i can connect my phone to the 2.4ghz network. Added the devices to alexa app and now I can control the switches with my voice, YAY! The only gripe i have is the night light feature cannot be disabled, and it's actually not very sensitive. I had to take a flashlight and shine it directly at the sensor within 10" for night light to turn off. So the light stays on 24/7--annoying, and a waste of electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Trieu

customer_reviews.title: Dawn to dusk for nightlight only!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to discover that the dawn to dusk detector only controls the nightlight it has absolutely nothing to do with the switches. Read the product description very carefully. The switch came with a slip of paper saying to use Meross, which I went through downloading, installing, and registering for, I tried several different switches as there wasn't one similar in name or appearance and none of my guesses detected the switch. Then I saw the box said to use Smart Life instead, which I downloaded, installed and registered for, which detected the switch. Then I realized there was no dawn or dusk function. Such a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dill

customer_reviews.title: No way to control the night light.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for a bedroom, and there's NO way to control the LED light ring except the automatic sensor. You can't turn off the LED if you don't want it on in the dark! The outlets are controlled separately which is good, but NO switch and/or NO Alexa to control the LED night light. Terrible! I had to send it back. I was going to open it up and lobotomize the LED light ring, but it's like welded shut, no screws to open it up. F !
customer_reviews.author: Lee B.

customer_reviews.title: A Smart Switch Made to Amaze.
customer_reviews.text: The SUPERNIGHT Smart Switch is truly an amazing product made for the masses. The switch offers innovative additions and superior value that can't be found widely within this category. The nightlight is a great added bonus, turning off when light is detected and dimly lighting when it becomes dark. Additionally, it excels in functioning as a smart switch, giving amazing manual and distant control. The two buttons located on the face of the switch make it easy to control and the Smart Life App makes it accessible to control and to create schedules based on your needs. Overall, this switch is an amazing addition to any smart home, making it an amazing product for the future of tech.
customer_reviews.author: Novatech SE

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Update: the 2nd one also failed Now, can conclude, will only last few months. ******** Bought these end of Jan 2019 and 1 doesn’t connect wirelessly anymore. Tried reset, unplug/plug, confirmed connection 2.4, etc, still failed. The manual indicated, blinking blue (slow/quick), solid red, solid blue but did not mention a combination of red and blue which is the current status of the plug. Now, it’s just a normal switch operated manually. They’re great when working and for the price, good deal! But only last for few months. Maybe, I just got a bad one since the other plug is still working, connected. Your CHOICE, your RISK. Good day!
customer_reviews.author: L.Soriano

customer_reviews.title: If a Company isn't list clearly on box, move on!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this for under a couch table, never connected and directions are terrible! When plugged in I had two red lights, not blue and that was not mentioned. I tried resenting and both otions to connect, nothing would get it done, With either,(two pack) I switched to a different brand of device, wow, done in seconds. I even emailed the Tuya company listed and no response...I am deeply frustrated with this item/items. Sincerely, Marci
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Works great but the night light is an overkill
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine a situation where a night light on a smart plug makes sense. Usually, plugs are behind or under furniture or fixtures so the night light is just a waist of power. I figured I could turn the light off in the app but I found out there is no way to turn the light off. I have the plug in my garage under my miter saw so the light is blocked by the plugs, wires and legs of the saw. That said, the plug is heavy duty, connects easily, and never fails to work so I will keep it and just forget there is a night light on it.
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Outlets are compatible with amazon devices (i.e. tablet, echo, apps, etc). They are easy to install with a wifi connection and can be accessed from your "Alexa" app, along with any other devices, plugs, thermostat, etc. Each outlet/plug operates separately from each other even though it's a multi-plug. Currently using them for our printer, space heater, lamps, and air purifier. I could probably do without the nightlight feature since they also stay on when lamps are on in the room, but I don't mind them that much. Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps getting disconnected
customer_reviews.text: It will be working perfectly, then my mom will notice it's flashing red and not working. I have no idea why this keeps happening, but it kind of defeats the purpose of setting up something with a smart plug...especially if when it's flashing red, you can't turn it on by pressing the button...so I have to go to the app and set it up for her again...and she's not technologically advanced enough to do this on her own, so I have to actually go to visit her to do it. I'm really worried that it's just going to give out and not work...
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: works good with echo/Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Another Christmas gift to go with the echo spot I got for my aunt! This works great. she hooked it up to one of her lights she uses for reading and she said she is very pleased. she appreciates not having to get up to flip off the light when she is already cozied up in bed. she said she had no issues pairing the device, and it even looks nice and isn't too bulky or obnoxious. I am actually pretty impressed with her experience and as I have an echo myself, I am likely going to purchase myself one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moreau

customer_reviews.title: Automatic lamp or scentsy warmer turn on
customer_reviews.text: Love these outlets because i can get two plugs in one outlet without difficulty giving me 4 places to plug in my lamps and scentsy. I like the timer so i have it scheduled to turn on half hour before i come home so it turns my scentsy warmers on so my house smells awesome when i walk through through the door. Or my lamps are on before coming home so im not walking in in the dark. Hight recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather White

customer_reviews.title: Buyer’s remorse
customer_reviews.text: Tried to install this product. During the instal everything began connecting fine until circuit popped on the outlet/device. Ended up returning this product and spending the money to get a decent brand from a home improvement store. This is one of those times where you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this smart outlet for a few weeks, I’m happy to say it works better than I expected. It is very well made and its night light is absolutely beautiful. And it works flawlessly with Alexa. The instruction manual and the app give clear instruction on how to connect it to WiFi and Alexa. Although I still can’t figure out how to control the two outlets separately, I don’t think it is a huge problem for me since I turn both my lights on the same time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: haru

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to control some lights around the house where access to the switch isn't very convenient. I have the two side tables lights connect to each side one of the plugs. Very convenient. you can control each one individually or both at the same time. connected to my google home mini, just say "hey google turn on left lamp" and that's it. installation took less than 2 minutes. I might need more of those for other places around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but a little hard to connect the first time!
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the night light is on all the time when it is dark and cannot be turned off. Light output is about the same as a regular 4 W night light so it is acceptable. Had a little trouble getting the blue light to blink rapidly for initial configuration, but once I accomplished that, the rest was pretty easy. I have four of these plugs and they all seem to re-connect easily after moving the plug or power outage. The power usage accuracy does vary from plug to plug with the same item plugged in. I just wish they were you were UL listed and approved for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Geistlake

customer_reviews.title: So much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great and I am loving it. I have paired it with my Google Home mini and with my lights and chargers. The Smart Life app has a timer so my lights go on automatically every morning to wake me up. And it comes in a pack of two so you have 4 smart plugs and you can also control every plug individually which is a huge plus. So far so good. I may update my review if anything goes wrong but I don't see any problem so far. Nice little smart plug.
customer_reviews.author: Ertugrul E.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased multiple times. Alexa!
customer_reviews.text: My home security kept freezing up and I had to be home to manually reboot it. I purchased one of these and can power on/off from my phone or my work or home Alexa speakers. Have since purchased more to have my Alexa turn on/off Himalayan salt lamps and other routines around the home.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Download the Smart Life App FIRST!!!
customer_reviews.text: The documentation that came with this pair of Supernight plugs was for a different product and instructed me to download an incompatible app which is the reason for 4 stars... Once I came back here and saw the reference to the Smart Life App, everything worked as expected except you need to hold down one of the power switches until the two power switch lights blink fast red...then the app will discover the plug. I've already synced it up with Google Home and it works great...
customer_reviews.author: Robert I.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so hight tech plug! I received in a very quick shipment, the installation is not so bad as long as you have the wi-fi on. I use it for my badroom lamp and planing to use the schedule functions while I am out of the state for my vacation next month. It also come with a night light which is a plus, I share the device with my family by the app, so everyone can turn the lights on or off when they entering my room.
customer_reviews.author: Yuli Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Surprised how well it works
customer_reviews.text: I can connect to this socket with my phone. Considering I have it across my room and I don't want to get up each time I want to turn off my lamp, this is perfect. I have my phone on me all the time so I can click on the app to turn it off. It's convenient. And you can turn off one side of the socket too if you want. I have my water boiler ready as well when I want my tea or ramen ready to go. If you're thinking of having something with IoT, this is it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Harper

customer_reviews.title: Keeps going offline.
customer_reviews.text: Product works fine, the night light is not bright at all, very small area that lights up. Not knocking for that but the main problem for me has been keeping it connected to the wifi. It seems at least one or twice a month it disconnects and you have to try several times to get it back online. I have several wifi smart plugs of different brands and this brand has given me the most problems.
customer_reviews.author: E Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Easier to setup than other smartplugs, comes with night light built in
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because of the nightlight and because its a 2-pack. Nightlight works great, theres a light sensor that turns the night light on/off (it's not something you can manually turn off). Setting up was super easy using Smart Life app on iOS (actually easier to set these up compared with my Wemo smart plug). I was able to pair one of the plugs with my Alexa and the other with my Google Home.
customer_reviews.author: Cam M. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to set up foreign app and sync with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I didn't understand that I would have to add an app to my phone to first set up this plug, and then to sync it with Alexa. The first plug I bought worked fine; the app wasn't too difficult to work through. I bought a second plug, and the app was no longer working but directed me to yet another app I had never used before. No instructions, nothing in the app that looked similar to the plug I had purchased, and NO LUCK getting my plug set up. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Good value easy to use
customer_reviews.text: In total, I’m very happy from This products . I have the one gang switch, two gang switch & the module switch. All work fine, without any problem, fast installation & very stable product. This WiFi outlet Working well with both google asst and alexa, using for a week now, and never complain, the app have many functionality with simple menu , easy setup and install, for the price is the best value
customer_reviews.author: YvetteC

customer_reviews.title: Work Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great plugs, small footprint so you can double up. I connected it to my google home and now have a voice activated light and fan! Edit: 3/23 One of them stopped working. I can't get it to reset and there doesn't seem to be any support, despite this page claiming lifetime tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Cohen

customer_reviews.title: So much nicer than the old style timers
customer_reviews.text: These work really well - I bought them during the holidays so I wouldn't have to run around the house turning lights on and off. I like having an app to set these up because it's so much easier than the old fashioned kind where you have to fuss with it every time you want to change a time on it. The app itself is okay, but could be better and more intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: SUPERLIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to set up on the network and get connected to alexa. I'll admit, I think the smart home devices could use a bit of refining when setting up, but at this price and the light feature makes for a great option if you like having a night light. I have other brands and versions of smart outlets, but this one is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Leto

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product that I own three of this design. Their design allows for two to be used in the same outlet which provides the ability to control four devices. The only draw back is the light is bright, so not the best use near a bed unless you require a night light. Works seamlessly with Alexa and the Smart Life app.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Love these and you will too! A+++
customer_reviews.text: These plugs are Bluetooth and you can link it up with Alexa, with these to help you, you can turn things off and on with your phone. So easy!! I love that it has a nice bright night light built in. Also you can turn off the power going to it when not in use. Each side has an on/off button. Download the app and plug it in. Simple. Very satisfying
customer_reviews.author: Aaron & Corrie Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using TP-Link WiFI plugs, but ran into some problems with them not connecting, so I wanted to try these. They work great - I like them better because they have two plugs, and each works independently with Alexa. It also has a built-in nightlight, and can monitor how much power is being used. I like them and want more.
customer_reviews.author: Phönix

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: This was great while it lasted. Now the lights are stuck on red. Nothing in the guide or online what to do about that. Just garbage with no support. My Wemo is still going. If you want to use the plug for a few weeks as a gimmick, buy this. If you want a plug that lasts, buy a Wemo
customer_reviews.author: Christopher and Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than 3 mo
customer_reviews.text: Died in less than 3 months after purchase. I bought this in February to plug my Christmas tree into in December. It was plugged in but only used occasionally. Came home yesterday to a bad electrical smell - turns out this plug totally burned out. Best not to waste your $$ on this one if it's going to last less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Installation Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Never did get it installed on Wi-Fi, or with Alexa functionality. Says to download the Smart life app from Google Play store, and when you use the app to scan the QR code on the device, it wants you to download an offsight .apk file, which gives all kinds of warnings and setting changes. No thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful night light and easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: I took a video for this Great product! Easy and fast installation. Set up is easy and done in a few minutes. Just work as advertised! Added the skill to my new Alexa so I can control them with my voice! lol! Extremely convenient for everything is controlled by my phone or alexa. Definitely buying more!!! Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jine-Hwa,Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This product do exactly what I want! I pair it with my google home mini and I can just ask google to turn off the switch! Wonderful product and amazing to use. I can also use my phone to remotely control the switch when I am at work. This switch is smart!
customer_reviews.author: Hanson Kwok

customer_reviews.title: Good smart plug, but..
customer_reviews.text: The led light that goes around stopped working 75% next day that I used it. So i got stuck with this ugly lighting smart plug. But it works great. And can't beat their price. I'll update if anything changes.. After using it for couple of months it actually disconnect from the app and you need to reconnect it in order for the plug to work..
customer_reviews.author: LoCi

customer_reviews.title: Great socket
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice investment. It switches on the night light automatically which is the best feature of it and it has two sockets which adds up the advantages of using it. We have to download an app on mobile phone called smartlife and then set up the socket using that. After setting it up it can be used with google home mini. I have giving instructions to google home to perform various actions on this socket. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mehul Shah

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect with Alexa!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to power my heater and my humidifier in my bedroom. It works with Alexa and has a timer function built into the app. I wasn’t sure how good it would be because I’ve never heard of the company but it was super easy. The nightlight is automatic and there’s no setting for it. It will turn on at dusk and off in the morning. Pretty neat. I’ll probably have to buy a couple more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Life changing, get on the train!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I have to admit, I was totally against the whole "smart things" lifestyle. I really thought it was all over rated.... boy was I wrong. These things are truly life changing. I love being able to give commands from another room or not having to get up and shut things off. I'm currently still exploring all the capabilities of "smart things" and all the available items that work this way but so far I'm thoroughly impressed with these being my first!
customer_reviews.author: Just meee

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I'm so not a tech savvy person, but this set up was so easy to understand. I had it completed in under 5 minutes and it works just like it should. I hooked it up to a main lamp that is difficult for my kids to turn on and off (height and twist switch) now they can use it without help!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Davis

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Product was very easy to use and it work well with my Amazon dot. The light design was great for people like me who get up many times at night. That's the smart life that I expected, maybe not something big, but something make your life easier. Very convenient, consider to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Updated***** link to alexa
customer_reviews.text: *Updated: the app has since been updated and everything works perfectly now. I was also contacted by the Seller with some suggested trouble shooting tips. Customer service was great and the product is too! Now that all issues have been resolved, I would definitely purchase this again! This does not work with Alexa! The app brings you to the sign in page to link with Alexa but never let's you sign in and link accounts. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: 2-in-1, Night light and smart plug.
customer_reviews.text: Just one time set up and works perfectly after that. I've other plugs as well but you can use this plug as a nightlight. You can configure both plugs individually in the application. We connected this plug to google home and it works really well with it. Really satisfied this plug, I definitely recommend if you want to buy a smart plug.
customer_reviews.author: Savan

customer_reviews.title: Smart plus plug light
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of plugs on Amazon with fake reviews. It has a night light! This was the primary reason for choosing this over others. Because I cannot find the outlet at night when the lights off before. Now I can find it easily and the night light will not affect your sleeping. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mountain DiggerTop Contributor: Travel

customer_reviews.title: Smart plug with night light
customer_reviews.text: Got the two pack, it is an awesome night light with smart plug. Very useful in the kids room as a night light when they want to move around. It has a small sensor to sense lights based on which the light gets activated. Easily paired up with Alexa and two outlets can be individually controlled. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have a few other smart plugs but they all take up entire slot or only come with 1 outlet. This is exactly what I needed for my smart home gadgets. It is super easy to set up and extremely responsive. A bonus that it act as a night lamp. This is as good as big name brands such as Amazon and Tp-Link.
customer_reviews.author: Ortha

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SMART PLUG
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact smart plug I was looking for. Light Night, double outlets in a single plug (unlike most other smart plugs), highly rated app & easy to navigate (easy wifi connection, but NO 5Hz wifi like others), very high voltage tolerance 16A (even though I don't need it..) I am looking forward to see this smart plug to support 5Hz Wifi, but this would increase the cost substantially I guess... Overall a highly efficient smart plug with reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: KKUS2013

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect but one flaw ruins it
customer_reviews.text: The nightlight light can't be turned off. I wrote the company and have not received a reply on how to turn it off. If you plan to use in a bedroom and don't like or want light, don't get this. Besides that, it works as intended and seems of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Plugs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these thinking they were going to be cheap and not work. Have been using them for a few weeks and they are working great. I have no complains and they dont take up much space either unlike some of the others. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: rhcp011235

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Can't turn nightlight off.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Does exactly exactly what I need it to do. Works great with Google Home. I also use the Smart Life App. Only thing is that you cannot turn the nightlight off. So if you are looking for one without a nightlight or one you can turn the nightlight off, this is not the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Shigley4

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Light automatically turns on when its dark and off when its daylight again. Plus it changes 1 plug into 2 plugs. And you can turn the plugs on and off. I couldn't get the app to work but still its a plug with a nightlight
customer_reviews.author: Amanda & Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Poor product no Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Worked well with my copper wire Internet. When I switch to fiber optics and new att modem the product no longer worked. Customer service is not reachable.
customer_reviews.author: gary toolan

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: We just hooked these up to work with our Christmas Tree lights and some little decorations and they are so convenient! I'm going to get another set to use upstairs in our baby's nursery for the lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gray

customer_reviews.title: Works with Google Assistant
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to setup with the given instructions and works very well with google assistant. I was able to connect it in 5-10 minutes. I loved the border lighting of the smart plug. Works best till now!
customer_reviews.author: SHAILENDRA

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Decent smart outlets, not my favorite that I own but the night light feature is interesting. Build quality isn't quite as good as my other plugs, but these get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and easy to use. Took 2 minutes to set up
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a few days to try it. It’s the best ever !!! Makes my house so easy to manage. Everything you can think of. Use it !!! Turn off a Scentsy. Turn off your fan. Simple set up and app is Great!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Smart Home Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and was very happy with the compatibility with my smart home products. I find the dual sockets and night light are an excellent option for the house. These make excellent gifts for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: BEAR

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: A double-outlet smart plug that's simple to set up and each of the two plugs may be turned on/off independently. Can be controlled with Alexa. Does not overlap space on the other wall outlet. Great device
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Finally these work as described!
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing many many home automation electronics. Most have failed, been junk or just did not work. These work great! I love the energy usage within the app! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: mike r.

customer_reviews.title: Love this smartplug!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smart plug... I am very glad with this purchase... It comes with night light sensor... When there is not enough lights it illuminates the surrounding with mild warm white...
customer_reviews.author: subaprakash

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this item
customer_reviews.text: Constantly disconnects with power issues and is very hard to reconnect. I have reached out to company for a copy of manual and had no response.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bathroom/kitchen/living room
customer_reviews.text: Im using this plug in my bedroom and for me is too bright but will perfect for night light in kitchen/bathroom or living room. Really like the buttons on the plug. Also can control using the app “smart home”
customer_reviews.author: Ihor Tkachuk

customer_reviews.title: Smart Socket for Smart People 😎😎
customer_reviews.text: This is the first smart socket for our new house and is really easy to use and works perfectly with my google home mini. You just have to say it to google assistant and smart socket just follows our command 💡💡💡💡
customer_reviews.author: Suprim Upadhyay

customer_reviews.title: I Don't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This plug was not easy to set up like the Amazon Smart Plug, and it doesn't work with a dual band router (or least not easily). Also, this does not connect directly to the Alexa app. You have to connect it through their app first--what a pain. Not worth the hassle--I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It’s really smart
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because its features, i can schedule turn on or turn off , i can turn on the light when i out of my house, wonderful, also i can control the outlet by connect them to my google home mini.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: After a few tries...gave up on setting this up. Most routers now have 2.4 and 5 ghz....I'm not sure why this is not set up automatically.
customer_reviews.author: bladeless fan - fan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this smart plug, it’s very good for me to set up my Christmas lights. I didn’t set up in Alexa , I just download the app and use app to set up my light schedule so everyday when I pick up my kids home, they can see the lights has been turned on automatically. It’s very easy to set up. I’m glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product we have tried everything to set up product and nothing we tried worked will not connect to iPhone or network came with very limited directions
customer_reviews.author: denise chest

customer_reviews.title: I loved them.
customer_reviews.text: What a great product I thought it was a good product but after I received them I knew they are a great product.
customer_reviews.author: mikepatterson71

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Stop thinking and buy this... Nightlight with good brightness with ability to sync with either Google assistant or alexa. Buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Night Lamp/wifi plug
customer_reviews.text: This plug is amazing!! I just got a google home and these two plugs got sync very smoothly. Very easy set up and easy to use. The lights on the plug is really good . No need of night lamps!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hitesh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work with newer routers
customer_reviews.text: If you have or get a newer duel router these plugs become lighted garbage, you can’t use them as they won’t connect
customer_reviews.author: Frank C. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Build a smart home easyliy
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is a "smart" lover. We can use google to control all the lights at our home. But it's not enough to him. So ones he found this product he would love to try!! Now he can turn on and off anything was not smart.
customer_reviews.author: JUMP

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more
customer_reviews.text: These are great around the house. I have a lot of appliances that don't have a timer like my air fryer and dehydrator. I use this so I can set it and forget it. I might also want to have a light turned on at a certain time, you can schedule that very easy
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The only thing that would be nice would be to be able to disable the nightlight feature, but aside from that, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: This smart outlet was easy to add to my system and easy to program. I also like the built in night light.
customer_reviews.author: CraigShipp.com

customer_reviews.title: Nice soothing night and WiFi connect ability
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it will light up in dark. Not very bright but enough to soothe you to sleep. It can connect to google home as well. Very good item to have.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love and I need to order three more of these. Easy set up, and paired with my Echo!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to set up with Alexa. You can suitch on/off each socket individually. Great night light. Overall I’m very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cocomoco

customer_reviews.title: They don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Follow the directions for set up and neither smart plug will connect with the app. Should be simple. Have multiple smart home accessories already and have never had this issue. And no support available by phone. Just email. We will see how long that takes. If it is very long will return to Amazon. Won’t buy any more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Most have to make your house hasnd free no hub is need it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome devise it works perfectly with 2.4g wifi bands. Nitgh lite add and extra bonus. Works great with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Jose E Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I love these receptacles they're great
customer_reviews.text: The selling point was they had two receptacles in one unit. It works great with Amazon Alexa, but I wish I could cut the light off on it
customer_reviews.author: jrbell62

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for my smart home!
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems linking with Alexa. Night light is a nice extra!
customer_reviews.author: 2 LOUD

customer_reviews.title: Good item!
customer_reviews.text: good to use, and light is help me when i wake at night. Its smart plug. Like it. I will buy it for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kuo

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price, Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Check out the video and let me know if you have any questions
customer_reviews.author: Michael Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for remote power:  $$ per outlet
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly, near instantaneous response even when used remotely over cell data network. Easy 90 second setup.
customer_reviews.author: James Bond

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: This plug is amazing!! I just got a google home and the two link up perfectly. Very easy set up and easy to use. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Itai Hak

customer_reviews.title: Smart plug that works with alexa
customer_reviews.text: I love This dual smart plug. It works well with my alexa home mini. I can now voice control the lighting which is connected to the plug. It does the job nicely and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Xianghai Sheng

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a smart plug that I could use to plug in some LED strip lighting in my kitchen. This one does the trick and allows me to control the lights through my google home mini. Was super easy to set up & does exactly what I need it to do!
customer_reviews.author: Grant A.

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Google home!
customer_reviews.text: I was just too excited when this arrived. I linked it with my new Google home and am one step closer to home automation. I can't wait to find out all the features but this is a great item
customer_reviews.author: Thia Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Work well with echo, light is bright
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. But the light is pretty bright and you can't dim it or turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: Advantange of having four plugs in two sets
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly for google home mini. The night light functions are cool and can easily be controlled through the phone. Cool device.
customer_reviews.author: Sushant

customer_reviews.title: Works Good!
customer_reviews.text: They only cover the plug that they are plug into so you can still use the other plug in your outlet.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: worked great until they stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a two pack of these in December. They worked great with both Alexa and Google Home. In January one has stopped working. The night light is on but both outlets are offline and they can't be switched on with the buttons anymore. I was really hoping for better quality on these based on the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outlet with nightlight
customer_reviews.text: Works great and it is nice to have a night light with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Grover

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. Easy to setup with google home and control lights. This has a very cool feature of night light which comes in handy for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Sachin

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Quite useful,i Like this plug Used for a flood light in garage convenient to have control over phone
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Basit

customer_reviews.title: stopped working with wifi
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this smart plug, I bought two of them and they have stopped syncing after a few weeks. the only part that is working fine is the sensor light
customer_reviews.author: Iman Kj

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Alexa. FYI: plugs work with smart life and not meross like the instructions iiib the package. Satisfied!
